welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jose C. Paz, Argentina! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Jose C. Paz has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at El Palomar Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to domestic flights, serving as a secondary terminal at El Palomar Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
